column1: Due to significant under-reporting of Quebec dialysis data between 2011 and 2019, data within this table is limited to the last 2 years. While dialysis data submission for Quebec recommenced in 2020, there still exists potential for under-reporting of prevalence in 2020–2021.
Canadian Organ Replacement Register, 2022, Canadian Institute for Health Information; Statistics Canada.
